relation: From this drop-down list, select the desired connection method. The available options are: pserver ext ssh (internal implementation) local
In this text box, type your login to the CVS server.
In this text box, specify the port to listen to on the CVS server host.
In this text box, type the name of the host where the desired CVS server is located.
In this text box, type the path to the CVS repository relative to the host name.
pageTitle: WebStorm 10.0.0 Help :: Configure CVS Root Field by Field Dialog
textBeforeTable: This dialog box opens when you click the Edit by Field button in the CVS Roots dialog box. Use this dialog box to specify the parameters for connecting to the CVS server and have WebStorm assemble them into a correct repository string according to the CVS root string syntax.
